target: There are 4 in that area do you have a price range or type of hotel you prefer?
context: <user> I'd like to find a restaurant that offers Asian Oriental cuisine, in the centre, if possible. <system> Definitely! I have places from cheap to expensive, though my favorite is Yippee Noodle Bar, which is moderately-priced. <user> I would like Yippee. <system> I'd be happy to make a reservation for you. What day/time will you be dining, and how many are in your party? <user> Monday, 19:00, for 6 people. <system> I have successfully reserved a table for your party of 6 at the Yippee Noodle Bar for Monday at 19:00. Your reference number is XSQHK9YG <user> Great, I also need a hotel room if you can help me find something. <system> Sure. We have several places ready to book. Which part of town would you like?<user> The west please. <system>
